data.meanings: To restrain from, exercise authority, command, give judgment, judge, be wise.
data.sentence: The word الْحَكِيمِ comes from the root ح ك م and is associated with the meanings: To restrain from, exercise authority, command, give judgment, judge, be wise.

data.meanings: to recite/read, compilation, collection, reading, recitation, explanation, study, investigation.
data.sentence: The word وَالْقُرْءَانِ comes from the root ق ر ا and is associated with the meanings: to recite/read, compilation, collection, reading, recitation, explanation, study, investigation.
